Hello World!

I’m Andrew, and I am currently a senior at Carnegie Mellon, majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Machine Learning.

I like creating software to solve challenging problems, and I believe in Computer Science as a tool to make a world a better and smarter place.

I’ve interned as a software engineer at Ninja Van, where I built a social commerce app featuring on-demand pickup and delivery. I’ve also worked at AKELES Consulting, where I built a number of popular JIRA plugins.

You can find out more about me here, view my past projects, or just say hi.
